notesStmt.note: Title from colophon. Cataloged by Poleman as Gurukavaca from the Īśvarapārvatīsaṁvāda of the Āgamasāra.
Fair condition. Ms. brown and slightly faded, with some tears and fraying on edges. Mistakes blotched out with black. Marginal corrections.

Begins: śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ śrīdevy uvāca deveśa parameśāna bhaktānugrahakāraka kuladharmaratā vīrās teṣāṁ siddheś ca kāraṇaṁ 1 brūhi me kṛpayā śaṁbho tava prītir mamopari sādhakānāṁ hitārthāya bhuktimuktipradāyakaṁ 2

Ends: paṭhyate yaḥ strikālaṁ hi sa mukto bhavabaṁdhanāt ity evaṁ kavacaṁ parāt parataraṁ divyaughasiddhaughavan mānaughāḥ kramaśas tathā paraguroḥ kāṣṭhā gu[ro-?] saṁjñitaṁ bhaktyādeśikamaṁtrarūpapaṭhitaṁ pī>ṭh]āmbuje śrīguruṁ dhyātvā śrīdavalīṁ[?] kavitvam aparam aṁte ca muktiṁ labhet 32
